attributes.action: Disband the organisation known as Postcomm.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Postcomm is the regulator for the Postal Industry and as such is meant to encourage fair competition and preserve the universal service.  However it is our belief that its relentless pursuit of the Royal Mail with excessive punitive measures will not result in any further improvement to the universal service provision but result in its eventual destruction and the loss of thousands of jobs.
